original_text: You have brought us out of a country where there is plenty of food and drink, enough for everyone. You have brought us here, where we will die in the desert. But it seems that that is not enough for you. It seems that you want to be our master as well!
korean_text: 네가 우리를 젖과 꿀이 흐르는 땅에서 이끌어 내어 광야에서 죽이려 함이 어찌 작은 일이기에 오히려 스스로 우리 위에 왕이 되려 하느냐

sentences.original_text: You have brought us out of a country
where there is plenty of food and drink
where we will die in the desert
But it seems that that is not enough for you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그것이 당신에게는 충분하지 않은 것 같습니다

sentences.original_text: It seems that you want to be our master as well
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 우리의 주인이 되고 싶어 하는 것 같습니다
